channel.title: WorldBuilder
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates

item.title: WorldBuilder 0.1.2+4
item.description:
## What's Changed * 17 terraintype selection for landscape tools shouldnt show roadtype texture by @trevis in https://github.com/Chorizite/WorldBuilder/pull/21 * chore: new changelog generation by @trevis in https://github.com/Chorizite/WorldBuilder/pull/22 * fix: wire up settings by @trevis in https://github.com/Chorizite/WorldBuilder/pull/23
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Chorizite/WorldBuilder/compare/v0.1.1...latest

item.title: WorldBuilder 0.1.1
item.description:
### ðŸ“‹ Changelog
- Fix bug where project creation failed if default projects directory didn't exist. - Fix various auto updater issues. - App now forces check for updates on startup. - Fix default install path missing a directory separator.
